mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auction_bid(iboard,buyer,buy,imbuy) VALUES (#{iboard},#{buyer},#{buy},(SELECT imbuy FROM auction WHERE iboard=#{iboard}));
mapper.update: UPDATE auction SET buy = (SELECT buy FROM auction_bid WHERE iboard = #{iboard}) , buyer = (SELECT buyer FROM auction_bid WHERE iboard = #{iboard}) WHERE iboard = #{iboard};
